name: Sandbox (TheSapphireDragon)
description:
This is the very first alpha test of a game I am developing. Future updates will include an inventory system, placing blocks, more blocks, multiplayer, and more. It is my intention to make this into a fully functional game but I am not sure if I will be able to, every donation helps to make that a possibility.

Controls:

Movement: A/D

Jump: Space

left click to break blocks

hold alt to break background blocks

press control to toggle line of sight block selection
